column2: Your wretch of a former regent that saw you imprisoned on charges of insanity no longer wields any influence at court. The new regent has released you.
Watch out, world! Here I come!
You have successfully thwarted your opponent's designs on your regency, and can continue to serve at the pleasure of [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName].
Like the spineless coward [From.GetSheHe] is, [From.GetTitledFirstName] has refused to rise to your challenge!
In a desperate effort to save [From.GetHerHis] skin, [From.GetTitledFirstName] has decided to abdicate the position of regent to you.

The blood of your opponent seeps into the ground as you lean on your sword to catch your breath. It was a brief and violent struggle, but the poor fool lies maimed at your feet, clinging pitifully to life. The day is yours.
The blood of your opponent seeps into the ground as you lean on your sword to catch your breath. It was a brief and violent struggle, but the poor fool lies dead at your feet.

[Root.Regent.GetFirstName] stabs wildly in the air with [Root.Regent.GetHerHis] dagger, missing you by a hair's breadth as you leap away in panic. Guards rush inside and pull your regent away as [Root.Regent.GetSheHe] screams, "Why won't you die?!"
Landed title changes de jure liege
After §Y$YEARS$§! years under the §Y$NEW_LIEGE$§!, the §Y$TITLE$§! is now considered part of it.
